original_title: 実録！呪われた心霊体験 怨霊激撮100連発!!
overview: A psychic documentary based on true stories, including psychic photographs based on posts, introductions of psychic spots, and drama reproductions of horror experiences. Follow the mysteries unique to modern times, such as ghost photographs related to mobile phone cameras and digital cameras.
title: Jitsuroku! Norowareta Shinrei Taiken Onryo Gekisatsu 100 Renpatsu
